biocontainers.name: spring
biocontainers.summary: Spring is a compression tool for Fastq files

biotools.summary: A tool for the analysis of genome rearrangements. SPRING takes two or more chromosomes as its input and then computes a minimum series of reversals and/or block-interchanges for transforming one chromosome into another. Phylogenetic trees based on the rearrangement analysis are also shown as part of the results.

bioschemas.name: SPRING
bioschemas.summary: A tool for the analysis of genome rearrangements. SPRING takes two or more chromosomes as its input and then computes a minimum series of reversals and/or block-interchanges for transforming one chromosome into another. Phylogenetic trees based on the rearrangement analysis are also shown as part of the results.
